alert.note: Alert for Parke; Vermillion; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 12:07AM EST until January 31 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Covington...down to Riverton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River at Lafayette. .Lowland flooding has developed along the Wabash from a combination of precipitation, snowmelt and additional rainfall on partially frozen ground. Minor flooding could be made worse by any ice jams that develop as river ice breaks up with the warmer temperatures and moves downstream. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Clinton. * WHEN...From Friday evening to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low bottomlands flood. Water begins to back up local tributaries. River road near Mecca is impassable. Higher county roads and bottomlands begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 19.9 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement will be issued by Friday afternoon.this afternoon by around 100 PM EST /noon CST/.
